testcase.name: Validate that User can launch Wowzi login page with a valid url
testcase.system-out: Given I enter a valid url...................................................passed Then User is redirected to the Wowzi login page.............................passed

testcase.name: Validate that User cannot log in with an invalid email address
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Wowzi login page..........................................passed When I enter an invalid email address.......................................passed And I enter a valid password................................................passed Then User is rejected from accessing the login page.........................passed

testcase.name: Validate that User cannot log in with an invalid password
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the Wowzi login page.......................................passed When User enter a valid email address.......................................passed And User enter an invalid password..........................................passed Then I am rejected from accessing the login page............................passed

testcase.name: Validate that User can click on the login button
testcase.system-out: Given Amen is on the Wowzi login page.......................................passed When Amen enters a valid email address......................................passed And Amen enters a valid password............................................passed And Amen clicks on the login button.........................................passed Then Amen is redirected to the next page....................................passed

testcase.name: Validate that User can access the User profile page
testcase.system-out: Given Customer is on the Wowzi login page...................................passed When Customer enters a valid email address..................................passed And Customer enters a valid password........................................passed And Customer clicks on the login button.....................................passed Then Customer is redirected to User profile page............................passed

testcase.name: Validate that User can close banner on the User profile page
testcase.system-out: Given Cheryl is on the Wowzi login page.....................................passed When Cheryl enters a valid email address....................................passed And Cheryl enters a valid password..........................................passed And Cheryl clicks on the login button.......................................passed Then Cheryl should be able to close the banner on the User profile page.....passed

testcase.name: Validate that User can logout of the Wowzi Application successfully
testcase.system-out: Given Amy is on the Wowzi login page........................................passed When Amy enters a valid email address.......................................passed And Amy enters a valid password.............................................passed And Amy clicks on the login button..........................................passed Then Amy should be able to close the banner on the User profile page........passed When Amy clicks on the settings icon........................................passed And Amy clicks on the logout button.........................................passed Then Amy should be logged out of the Wowzi Application successfully.........passed
